root.name: Mr. Driller: Drill Land
root.description: PlotA new theme park is being opened and Mr Driller (Susumu) and his friends are invited for the opening ceremony. However, they don't know that the owner of the theme park is actually Dr. Manhole, the mad scientist. Together with the Ankoku Drillers, he is trying to stop Mr. Driller (Susumu) his friends, so he can destroy the earth with gigantic drillers.
